addOnProducts.title: Live Cartoon Mascots For Kids Birthday Party
addOnProducts.description: 1 Live cartoon character who can greet and play with the children at your party The character will be available for 3 hrs The character will also be present for cake cutting Available characters are Mickey, Minnie, Chotabheem, Panda, Motu, Patlu, Doraemon, Chutki etc Mention your interested character name while booking, It will be arranged based on the availability
